pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, May 21, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the Global Health Summit, co-hosted by the European Union and Italy as Chair of the G20.

The summit will be streamed live via the following links: https://www.governo.it/it/diretta-video and https://www.youtube.com/palazzochigi.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Manitoba, Brian Pallister.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of Winnipeg, Brian Bowman.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual meeting with the Professor Mohan Singh Memorial Foundation to mark the 107th anniversary of the Komagata Maru incident.

Closed to media.
